refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: poly-bot converts all the polysolids in the specified input_file.g (or standard input, if no files are specified) to BOT solids and writes them to the output_file.g ( or standard out, if no files are specified on the command line). All other records (except FREE records) are copied verbatim. This command will only work with database version "v4" (BRL-CAD releases 5.3 and earlier).

refsect1.title: DIAGNOSTICS
refsect1.para: Error messages are intended to be self-explanatory.
